title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Not ISIS, not al Qaeda—white supremacists.

title: Biden2
speaker: Biden
text: This is a pandemic of the unvaccinated.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Enough people who believed that America does not belong to everyone and not everyone is created equal—Native Americans, Asian Americans, Hispanic Americans, Black Americans.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Literal hell was unleashed.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: And most people didn’t realize that, a century ago, a second Ku Klux Klan had been founded—the second Ku Klux Klan had been founded.

title: Biden2
speaker: Biden
text: This is totally unacceptable.

title: Washington1
speaker: Washington
text: No People can be bound to acknowledge and adore the invisible hand, which conducts the Affairs of men more than the People of the United States.

title: Trump1
speaker: Trump
text: Thank you, God bless you, and God bless America.

title: Trump2
speaker: Trump
text: Instead of saying “thank you” to the United States, they chanted “death to America.” In fact, they chanted “death to America” the day the agreement was signed.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Neo-Nazis, white supremacists, the KKK coming out of those fields at night in Virginia with lighted torches—the veins bulging on their—as they were screaming.

title: Biden2
speaker: Biden
text: As soon as they are authorized, those eligible will be able to get a booster right away in tens of thousands of site across the—sites across the country for most Americans, at your nearby drug store, and for free.

title: Biden2
speaker: Biden
text: These pandemic politics, as I refer to, are making people sick, causing unvaccinated people to die.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Well, Mother Fletcher said when she saw the insurrection at the Capitol on January the 9th [6th], it broke her heart—a mob of violent white extremists—thugs.

title: Trump1
speaker: Trump
text: You are attacking it, and you are attacking our country.

title: Washington1
speaker: Washington
text: Such being the impressions under which I have, in obedience to the public summons, repaired to the present station; it would be peculiarly improper to omit in this first official Act, my fervent supplications to that Almighty Being who rules over the Universe, who presides in the Councils of Nations, and whose providential aids can supply every human defect, that his benediction may consecrate to the liberties and happiness of the People of the United States, a Government instituted by themselves for these essential purposes: and may enable every instrument employed in its administration to execute with success, the functions allotted to his charge.

title: Biden2
speaker: Biden
text: So, parents, please get your teenager vaccinated.

title: Trump1
speaker: Trump
text: It must stop, whether you are on the right or on the left, a democrat or a republican, there is never a justification for violence.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Millions of white Americans belonged to the Klan, and they weren’t even embarrassed by it; they were proud of it.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Hell was unleashed.

title: Biden1
speaker: Biden
text: Instead of consigning millions of American children to under-resourced schools, let’s give each and every child, three and four years old, access to school—not daycare, school.
